Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at H10 Puerta de Alcalá, you'll be centrally located in Madrid, convenient to National Archaeological Museum of Spain and Prado Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Puerta de Alcala and Teatro Fernan Gomez.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 146 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and supervised childcare/activities. Additional features include babysitting/childcare, gift shops/newsstands, and wedding services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Madrid? This hotel has 358 square feet (33 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at H10 Puerta de Alcalá, you'll be centrally located in Madrid, convenient to National Archaeological Museum of Spain and Prado Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Puerta de Alcala and Teatro Fernan Gomez.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

National Archaeological Museum of Spain - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Puerta de Alcala - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Teatro Fernan Gomez - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Plaza de Colon - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
National Library - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Velazquez Palace - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Sports Palace Madrid - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
National Museum of Decorative Arts - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Madrid Wax Museum - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
La Caixa Foundation - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Crystal Palace - 1 km / 0.6 mi
El Retiro Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Galeria Moriarty - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Fundacion Juan March - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Plaza de Cibeles - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The preferred airport for H10 Puerta de Alcalá is Madrid (MAD-Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas) - 10.8 km / 6.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
